snippet: President Obama must be ready to withhold billions of economic and military aid if the deal falls apart.
abstract: Editorial welcomes compromise deal brokered by Sec of State John Kerry over Afghanistan's contested presidential election; holds it has pulled nation back from civil war and created chance for peaceful political transition; warns deal remains tenuous and that Pres Obama should be prepared to withdraw billions in aid should candidates Abdullah Abdullah or Shraf Ghani upend it.
lead_paragraph: President Obama must be ready to withhold billions of economic and military aid if the deal falls apart.

headline.seo: John Kerry’s Compromise Deal Lays Out a Way Forward for Afghans
headline.main: Back From the Brink in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Back From the Brink in Afghanistan
